LanguageData.Exiled.label: Exiliado
LanguageData.Exiled.description: Un sobreviviente trenzado con orígenes muy enigmáticos trata de escapar de Rimworld. No hay nada que lo ayude en este esfuerzo, sino sus propias habilidades. El verdadero testamento de cualquier superviviente del planeta. \n\nVerdadero escenario Hardcore Usted jugará con la raza humana.
LanguageData.Exiled.scenario.summary: An enigmatic survivor tries to escape from a hostile world, with nothing but his wits to help him.
LanguageData.Exiled.scenario.parts.0.text:
You are not sure how you got there. Maybe it was something you did to someone. Maybe you pushed your luck too hard. Whatever brought you there, it strangely feels like it was on purpose. Next to you lies a note, that says:

"I managed to sneak you out of there, but you need to leave this world ASAP. Best of luck." 

Tou don't know who wrote this, but it seems like you need to start a camp to survive.
